name: Please Stand By -I Got Something To Say 072
description: Please Stand By utilizes the iconic SMPTE color bars template and changes the palette to bring into question viewers perceptions surrounding "standards of color." An offshoot of my original series, I Got Something To Say, adds an additional more literal message. Please Stand By,We're Still Early. Everyday I see evidence that proves we're still early in this NFT game. Can you imagine what our collections will be worth once the mainstream adopts this marketplace?!
